title: Check Spare Part Inventory
description: A technician needs a specific hydraulic pump to repair a machine and must check if it's in the maintenance storeroom.

tasks.description: Identify the part number for the required hydraulic pump.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the part number from the equipment's BOM.

tasks.description: Search the inventory system for the part number to check stock levels and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that there are two pumps in stock in the main storeroom.

tasks.description: Create a request to withdraw one pump from inventory for the repair job.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves one pump against the maintenance work order.
